name: swarm (itch) (mswieboda)
description:
swarm - 3D alien defense

Survive the swarms of aliens, defending your supply depot from being destroyed!

Keyboard & Mouse
WASD  - move
Left Click - fire
Space - Jump
R - reload
E - place soldier AI (up to 3 per wave)
Enter - start wave

Game Pad
Left Joystick - move
Right Trigger - fire
A - Jump
X - reload
Y - place soldier (up to 3 per wave)
Start - start wave

You can place up to 3 AI soldiers each wave, and then start the wave manually. The wave ends when all enemies are killed, and it's game over when the supply depot inevitably gets destroyed by the aliens...
